abstract: Turkey and Iran agree to cooperate against separatist Kurdish violence along their borders.
snippet: The agreement came as thousands of Turkish troops began the second day of a major offensive against Kurdish rebels in southeastern Turkey and Iraq.
lead_paragraph: The agreement came as thousands of Turkish troops began the second day of a major offensive against Kurdish rebels in southeastern Turkey and Iraq.

headline.main: Turkey and Iran Agree to Cooperate Against Kurdish Rebels on Borders
headline.print_headline: Turkey and Iran Agree to Cooperate Against Kurdish Rebels on Borders
headline.seo: Turkey and Iran Agree to Cooperate Against Kurdish Rebels
